name: tussock
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a thick mass of grass or other plants growing together: He stumbled over a tussock of grass and hurt his ankle. The hills are covered with heather, blueberry, gorse, bramble, creeping willow, and grass tussocks.
More examplesFewer examplesAs kids, he and his buddy Billy explored every inch of the area, getting to know every bush and tussock.The light of the setting sun illuminated the tussocks of last year's grass that covered the rolling plateau.She began to run down the hill, jumping from tussock to tussock.
